title: DPSRU Notification 2026 - Walk-in interview for 12 Teaching Staff Posts
description: The Delhi Pharmaceutical Sciences and Research University (DPSRU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 12 Assistant Professor and  Guest Faculty Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B. Pharm, M. Pharm, BAMS, and Ph.D. can apply for the DPSRU Notification 2026. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentio...
